Package com.foreach.across.core.config

Class AcrossConfig

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.core.config.AcrossConfig
@Configuration @Import({org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.validation.ValidationAutoConfiguration.class,com.foreach.across.core.config.AcrossDataSourceRegistrar.class}) public class AcrossConfig extends Object
Installs the common Across Context beans that are always available.
